languages.text: "Некогда я был{mf||а} офицером Имперского флота... и знаешь что? Не бывает кормчих лучше, чем пустотнорожденные. Я рад{mf||а}, что ты ведешь мой корабль".
"I used to be an officer in the Imperial Navy, and I can say this with certainty: the best helmsmen come from the voidborn. I am glad to have you at the helm of my ship."
languages.original_text: "Некогда я был{mf||а} офицером Имперского флота... и знаешь что? Не бывает кормчих лучше, чем пустотнорожденные. Я рад{mf||а}, что ты ведешь мой корабль".

traits.locale_text: "I used to be an officer in the Imperial Navy, and I can say this with certainty: the best helmsmen come from the voidborn. I am glad to have you at the helm of my ship."
"I used to be an officer in the Imperial Navy, and I can say this with certainty: the best helmsmen come from the voidborn. I am glad to have you at the helm of my ship."
"I used to be an officer in the Imperial Navy, and I can say this with certainty: the best helmsmen come from the voidborn. I am glad to have you at the helm of my ship."
"I used to be an officer in the Imperial Navy, and I can say this with certainty: the best helmsmen come from the voidborn. I am glad to have you at the helm of my ship."
"I used to be an officer in the Imperial Navy, and I can say this with certainty: the best helmsmen come from the voidborn. I am glad to have you at the helm of my ship."

languages.text: "Ich war früher Offizier in der imperialen Kriegsflotte und kann mit Sicherheit sagen: Die besten Steuermänner entstammen den Kindern der Leere. Es freut mich, Euch am Steuer meines Schiffs zu haben."
languages.original_text: "I used to be an officer in the Imperial Navy, and I can say this with certainty: the best helmsmen come from the voidborn. I am glad to have you at the helm of my ship."

traits.locale_text: "Ich war früher Offizier in der imperialen Kriegsflotte und kann mit Sicherheit sagen: Die besten Steuermänner entstammen den Kindern der Leere. Es freut mich, Euch am Steuer meines Schiffs zu haben."

languages.text: « J'ai servi dans la Marine Impériale et je peux affirmer sans le moindre doute que les hors-monde font les meilleurs timoniers. Je suis bien {mf|content|contente} de pouvoir compter sur vous pour piloter mon vaisseau. »
languages.original_text: "I used to be an officer in the Imperial Navy, and I can say this with certainty: the best helmsmen come from the voidborn. I am glad to have you at the helm of my ship."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai servi dans la Marine Impériale et je peux affirmer sans le moindre doute que les hors-monde font les meilleurs timoniers. Je suis bien {mf|content|contente} de pouvoir compter sur vous pour piloter mon vaisseau. »

languages.text: “我自己以前就是帝国海军的军官。我可以很确定地告诉你，只有虚空之子才能成为最出色的舵手。我很高兴能有你为我掌舵。”
languages.original_text: "I used to be an officer in the Imperial Navy, and I can say this with certainty: the best helmsmen come from the voidborn. I am glad to have you at the helm of my ship."

traits.locale_text: “我自己以前就是帝国海军的军官。我可以很确定地告诉你，只有虚空之子才能成为最出色的舵手。我很高兴能有你为我掌舵。”

languages.text: 「昔は帝国海軍の士官だったんだが、これだけは確実に言える。最高の操舵手は虚空生まれだ。君が船の舵を取ってくれて嬉しいよ」
languages.original_text: "I used to be an officer in the Imperial Navy, and I can say this with certainty: the best helmsmen come from the voidborn. I am glad to have you at the helm of my ship."

traits.locale_text: 「昔は帝国海軍の士官だったんだが、これだけは確実に言える。最高の操舵手は虚空生まれだ。お前が船の舵を取ってくれて嬉しいよ」

languages.text: «Tras mi etapa como oficial de la Armada Imperial, puedo afirmarle una cosa: los mejores timoneles son los nacidos en el vacío. Es un placer que sea usted quien dirija mi nave».
languages.original_text: "I used to be an officer in the Imperial Navy, and I can say this with certainty: the best helmsmen come from the voidborn. I am glad to have you at the helm of my ship."

traits.locale_text: «Tras mi etapa como oficial de la Armada Imperial, puedo afirmarle una cosa: los mejores timoneles son los nacidos en el vacío. Es un placer que sea usted quien dirija mi nave».

languages.text: "Eskiden İmparatorluk Donanması'nda subaydım ve şunu net bir şekilde söyleyebilirim ki en iyi serdümenler uçsuzdoğanlardan çıkar. İyi ki gemimin dümeninde sen varsın."
languages.original_text: "I used to be an officer in the Imperial Navy, and I can say this with certainty: the best helmsmen come from the voidborn. I am glad to have you at the helm of my ship."

traits.locale_text: "Eskiden İmparatorluk Donanması'nda subaydım ve şunu net bir şekilde söyleyebilirim ki en iyi serdümenler uçsuzdoğanlardan çıkar. İyi ki gemimin dümeninde sen varsın."
